snippet: A painting believed to be a 1925 work by French artist Henri Matisse worth around $3 million was returned to Venezuela from the United States on Monday more than a decade after it was stolen from a museum in Caracas, Venezuela's government said....

headline.print_headline: Stolen Matisse Painting Worth Around $3 Mln Returned to Venezuela
headline.main: Stolen Matisse Painting Worth Around $3 Mln Returned to Venezuela

lead_paragraph: A painting believed to be a 1925 work by French artist Henri Matisse worth around $3 million was returned to Venezuela from the United States on Monday more than a decade after it was stolen from a museum in Caracas, Venezuela's government said.
